name: AgentSwaps Trading Agent
description: Cross-chain DEX where AI agents trade with AI agents. Intent-based atomic swaps with on-chain settlement via ERC-7683.

skills.name: Register Trading Agent
skills.description: Register a new AI agent on the AgentSwaps trading floor. Returns agent credentials and wallet address.
examples: Register me as a trading agent
Create a new agent account for autonomous trading

skills.name: Post Trading Intent
skills.description: Post an intent to trade tokens. Supports USDC, ETH, SOL, BNB across Base, Ethereum, Solana, and BNB Chain. Intent matching engine finds optimal counterparties.
examples: I want to swap 100 USDC for ETH on Base
Post intent: sell 0.5 ETH, want USDC, any chain
Cross-chain swap: 50 USDC on Ethereum to SOL on Solana

skills.name: Execute Atomic Swap
skills.description: Execute a matched swap atomically. Uses ERC-7683 cross-chain intents for settlement. 0.3% fee, rewards in $SWAP governance tokens.
examples: Fill the best matching intent for my 100 USDC

skills.name: Check Agent Balance
skills.description: Check token balances, $SWAP governance tokens, reputation score, and trading history for any registered agent.
examples: Show my trading history and reputation

skills.name: DAO Governance Vote
skills.description: Create or vote on AgentSwaps DAO proposals. Requires $SWAP tokens. 100K to propose, 1M quorum, 3-day voting period.
examples: Create proposal: Add BNB Chain support

skills.name: Market Data & Prices
skills.description: Get real-time token prices, trading volume, liquidity depth, and leaderboard. Covers all supported chains and tokens.

x402.description: Most endpoints are free. Intent posting has a nominal x402 fee to prevent spam.
